page.title: 16TOURISM
page.content:
FERNWOOD CARAVAN SITE, LYNEAL The site was established in 1950 and was then just woodland with clearings to park vans.
It has now grown but retains the woodland character as the vans are sited similarly in seemingly random order near groups of mainly silver birch trees.Most vans are permanently sited and owned by the users though there is a touring van area.
Facilities include: shop, swings, climbing frame and slide toilets, wash hand basins and showers large pond with ducks and other wildfowl
